peril.views.slick.util

Class Region

  • java.lang.Object
    • peril.views.slick.util.Region

  • public final class Region
extends java.lang.Object
    This denotes the region of pixels given on screen where each pixel is given a boolean value based on a predetermined set of conditions. The way that this object is constructed defines these conditions. When isValid(Point) is called the boolean returned will be based on the pixels validity defined upon Region construction.

    The Region.Reducer takes the Region defined by the Image and reduces the size of the Region so that there is the minimum memory over head.
    Since:
    2018-02-18
    Version:
    1.01.02
    Author:
    Joshua_Eddy
    See Also:
    Image, Region.Reducer

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private class  Region.Reducer
      The helper is designed to reduce a boolean[] from a specified width and height to the smallest possible boolean[] without loosing any data.

      Constructors

      Constructs a combined Region where the valid pixel value is true as the specified boolean[] is already 'not reduced' region.

      Constructs a new Region using an Image where the valid pixel value is any value except transparent.

      Constructs a new Region using an Image where the valid pixel value is the specified Color.
      Region(int width, int height, Point position)
      Constructs a new Region that is a rectangle where the whole region is the valid value by definition.

    • Field Detail

      • DEFAULT_TRANSPARENCY

        private static final int DEFAULT_TRANSPARENCY
        The default transparency of the Colored pixel on the Region equivalent Image. Bounds: 0 - 255
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • object

        private final boolean[] object
        The boolean[] where if a pixel from the specified Image is valid then it is assigned true, otherwise it is false. The valid value for a pixel is determined by how the Region is constructed.

        private final java.util.Map<org.newdawn.slick.Color,org.newdawn.slick.Image> versions

      • isValid

        public boolean isValid(Point point)
        Retrieves whether or not the specified Point is inside this Region and if it is then whether the pixel at that position has a valid value based on the conditions that were defined when the Region was constructed.
